title: description
Fall Out Boy's Genever Cocktail Variatio: A careful mix between the Genever Cocktail Variation and the Hot Brick Toddy. As careful as Fall Out Boy's writers.

title: notes
Fall Out Boy's Genever Cocktail Variatio: Gin, Lime and a hint of rage.

title: pairing
Fall Out Boy's Genever Cocktail Variatio: Fall Out Boy has it with a wish Breakfast Bacon and strudel.

title: serving_suggestion
Fall Out Boy's Genever Cocktail Variatio: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the collides sounds of My Songs Know What You Did In The Dark Light Em Up.
